title: PHS Lookups
text: goal phslookups provide helper functions easily access use lookups provided analysis.

title: PHS Lookups
text: can install latest version phslookups GitHub : yet available PHS Posit Package Manager, never available CRAN intended internal package.

title: PHS Lookups
text: Load Scottish Postcode Directory

title: Get HSCP Locality lookup — get_hscp_locality
text: Read Health Social Care Partnership (HSCP) Locality lookup file cl-tibble.

title: Get HSCP Locality lookup — get_hscp_locality
text: version string defining version read . default value "latest", otherwise supply date (file name suffix), e.g. "20230804". col_select Columns include results. can use mini-language dplyr::select() refer columns name. Use c() use one selection expression. Although usage less common, col_select also accepts numeric column index. See ?tidyselect::language full details selection language.

title: Get HSCP Locality lookup — get_hscp_locality
text: tibble HSCP localities lookup

title: Get HSCP Locality lookup — get_hscp_locality
code: get_hscp_locality() #> Error: [ENOENT] Failed to search directory '/conf/linkage/output/lookups/Unicode/Geography/HSCP Locality': no such file or directory get_hscp_locality(version = "20240308") #> Error: ✖ "HSCP Locality" version "20240308" is NOT available #> ℹ Contact phs.geography@phs.scot get_hscp_locality(col_select = c("datazone2011", "hscp_locality")) #> Error: [ENOENT] Failed to search directory '/conf/linkage/output/lookups/Unicode/Geography/HSCP Locality': no such file or directory

title: Get Data Zone-SIMD lookup — get_simd_datazone
text: Read Data Zone-Scottish Index Multiple Deprivation (SIMD) lookup file cl-tibble.

title: Get Data Zone-SIMD lookup — get_simd_datazone
text: simd_version string defining SIMD version. default value "latest". Alternatively can supply string defining specific version. follow pattern "YYYY" "YYYYv2", e.g. "2020v2". col_select Columns include results. can use mini-language dplyr::select() refer columns name. Use c() use one selection expression. Although usage less common, col_select also accepts numeric column index. See ?tidyselect::language full details selection language.

title: Get Data Zone-SIMD lookup — get_simd_datazone
text: tibble SIMD DataZone lookup

title: Get Data Zone-SIMD lookup — get_simd_datazone
code: get_simd_datazone() #> Error: [ENOENT] Failed to search directory '/conf/linkage/output/lookups/Unicode/Deprivation': no such file or directory get_simd_datazone(simd_version = "2016") #> Error: [ENOENT] Failed to search directory '/conf/linkage/output/lookups/Unicode/Deprivation': no such file or directory get_simd_datazone(   simd_version = "2016",   col_select = c("DataZone2011", "simd2016rank") ) #> Error: [ENOENT] Failed to search directory '/conf/linkage/output/lookups/Unicode/Deprivation': no such file or directory

title: Get Postcode-SIMD lookup — get_simd_postcode
text: Read Postcode-Scottish Index Multiple Deprivation (SIMD) lookup file cl-tibble.

title: Get Postcode-SIMD lookup — get_simd_postcode
text: postcode_version string defining postcode version. default value "latest". Alternatively can supply string defining specific version like load. follow pattern "YYYY_1" "YYYY_2", e.g. "2023_2". simd_version string defining SIMD version. default value "latest". Alternatively can supply string defining specific version. follow pattern "YYYY" "YYYYv2", e.g. "2020v2". col_select Columns include results. can use mini-language dplyr::select() refer columns name. Use c() use one selection expression. Although usage less common, col_select also accepts numeric column index. See ?tidyselect::language full details selection language.

title: Get Postcode-SIMD lookup — get_simd_postcode
text: tibble SIMD Postcode lookup

title: Get Postcode-SIMD lookup — get_simd_postcode
code: get_simd_postcode() #> Error: [ENOENT] Failed to search directory '/conf/linkage/output/lookups/Unicode/Deprivation': no such file or directory get_simd_postcode(postcode_version = "2016_1", simd_version = "2012") #> Error: ✖ "SIMD Postcode" version 2016_1 and 2012 is NOT available #> ℹ Contact phs.geography@phs.scot  library(dplyr) #>  #> Attaching package: ‘dplyr’ #> The following objects are masked from ‘package:stats’: #>  #>     filter, lag #> The following objects are masked from ‘package:base’: #>  #>     intersect, setdiff, setequal, union get_simd_postcode(   postcode_version = "2016_1",   simd_version = "2012",   col_select = c("pc7", starts_with("simd")) ) #> Error: ✖ "SIMD Postcode" version 2016_1 and 2012 is NOT available #> ℹ Contact phs.geography@phs.scot

what: Get Scottish Postcode Directory lookup — get_spd
title: Get Scottish Postcode Directory lookup — get_spd
text: Read Scottish Postcode Directory (SPD) lookup file cl-tibble.

title: Get Scottish Postcode Directory lookup — get_spd
Get Scottish Postcode Directory lookup — get_spd
text: version string defining version read . default value "latest" latest SPD file available cl-loaded. Alternatively can supply string defining specific version like load. follow pattern "YYYY_1" "YYYY_2", e.g. "2023_2". See details information. col_select Columns include results. can use mini-language dplyr::select() refer columns name. Use c() use one selection expression. Although usage less common, col_select also accepts numeric column index. See ?tidyselect::language full details selection language.

title: Get Scottish Postcode Directory lookup — get_spd
text: tibble Scottish Postcode Directory lookup file selected columns.

title: Get Scottish Postcode Directory lookup — get_spd
text: SPD lookup files sourced following folder \\stats\cl-\lookups\Unicode\Geography\Scottish Postcode Directory Archive subfolder. updated twice year, denoted suffix name: Scottish_Postcode_Directory_YYYY_X", YYYY denotes year X denotes release number year (X = 1 X = 2). Please note oldest available version "2016_1".

title: Get Scottish Postcode Directory lookup — get_spd
code: get_spd() #> Error: [ENOENT] Failed to search directory '/conf/linkage/output/lookups/Unicode/Geography/Scottish Postcode Directory': no such file or directory get_spd(version = "2023_2", col_select = c("pc7", "latitude", "longitude")) #> Error: ✖ "SPD" version "2023_2" is NOT available #> ℹ Contact phs.geography@phs.scot

title: phslookups 0.1.0
text: Initial version includes: get_hscp_locality(), get_simd_datazone(), get_simd_postcode(), get_spd()
